resources.string: Main Activity - the home screen of my app. It navigates to other subscreens like artists, albums, songs or stored playlists. At the bottom the subscription button provides options for the payment.

Subscription Activity - the purpose of this activity is to manage the subscription through the Play Console, or by using the Google Play Developer API. The Subscriptions and In-App Purchases API would let the user manage in-app purchases and subscriptions. There would be 2 types of subscriptions, monthly and yearly. So far the buttons only navigate the user to Google Play platform other actitivies are not implemented yet.
Playlist Activity - it would offer the user to manage his playlists. Search function would work within the stored playlists. The music player would be implemented by MediaPlayer class.

Artist Activity - it would offer a selection of artists with all albums and songs stored on device. Search function would work among artists. The music player would be implemented by MediaPlayer class.
Album Activity - it would offer a selection of all albums stored on device. Search function would work among albums. The music player would be implemented by MediaPlayer class.
Song Activity - it would offer a list of all songs stored on device in alphabetic order. Search function would work among songs. The music player would be implemented by MediaPlayer class.
